StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SaveGradCommDateChangeRequest]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID uniqueiden..er, @NwaGUID uniqueiden..er, @FormID uniqueiden..er, @RequestDate date.me, @RequestStatusID int, @LastEditBy uniqueiden..er, @GradDate date.me, @CommissionDate date.me, @ReferenceText varchar(1000) ) AS
BEGIN TRANSACTION
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[Request] WHERE ID = @ID) BEGIN UPDATE [ACP].[Request] SET [NWA_GUID] = @NwaGUID, [FormID] = @FormID, [RequestDate] = @RequestDate, [RequestStatusID] = @RequestStatusID, [LastEditDate] = GetDate(), [LastEditBy] = @LastEditBy WHERE ID = @ID
UPDATE [ACP].[GradCommDateChangeRequest] SET [GradDate] = @GradDate, [CommissionDate] = @CommissionDate, [ReferenceText] = @ReferenceText WHERE RequestID = @ID
END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [ACP].[Request] ( [ID], [NWA_GUID], [FormID], [RequestDate], [RequestStatusID], [LastEditDate], [LastEditBy] ) VALUES ( @ID, @NwaGUID, @FormID, @RequestDate, @RequestStatusID, GetDate(), @LastEditBy )
INSERT INTO [ACP].[GradCommDateChangeRequest] ( [RequestID], [GradDate], [CommissionDate], [ReferenceText] ) VALUES ( @ID, @GradDate, @CommissionDate, @ReferenceText )
END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION -- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully, commit the transac.on COMMIT TRANSACTION
